issue.title: [Rust] Error in aggregate of min/max for strings
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10048](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10048). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There is an error in computing the min/max of strings with nulls.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10048?focusedCommentId=17199402) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8226
